7800.description: Double-click to randomly change into another item. The changed item can be used as a regular ingredient to make other items. Item - Easy Black Fish

7807.name: Green Colored Lure - For Beginners
7807.description: A lure used by beginners. Since only the fish intended for beginners take the bait, a player can easily learn how to fish. This bait is preferred by fast fish.

7808.name: Purple Colored Lure - For Beginners
7808.description: A lure used by beginners. Since only the fish intended for beginners take the bait, a player can easily learn how to fish. This bait is preferred by fat fish.

7809.name: Yellow Colored Lure - For Beginners
7809.description: A lure used by beginners. Since only the fish intended for beginners take the bait, a player can easily learn how to fish. This bait is preferred by ugly fish.

7810.name: Soulfire Dirk - Mana Up
7810.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Special Ability: Mana Up

7811.name: Soulfire Dirk - Magic Hold
7811.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Dryad Root when using a magic skill on the target.

7812.name: Soulfire Dirk - Magic Silence
7812.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target.

7813.name: Hell Knife - Magic Regeneration
7813.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Casts Regeneration on a target with a 30% chance when using a magic skill on the target.

7814.name: Hell Knife - Mental Shield
7814.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target.

7815.name: Hell Knife - Magic Weakness
7815.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 7% chance of casting Curse: Weakness when using a magic skill on the target.

7832.description: An exchange coupon that is needed to borrow weapons for apprentice adventurers from the Adventurers' Guide.

7833.name: Adventurer's Magic Accessory Exchange Coupon
7833.description: Use this exchange coupon to borrow magic accessories from the Adventurers' Guild.

7835.name: Amulet: Seal of Disease
7835.description: Amulet required for the Seal of Disease spell. Used by Dominators.

7836.name: Santa's Hat
7836.description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day. Uses 2 hair accessory slots.

7838.name: Santa's Hat
7838.description: A Santa Claus hat that was created to celebrate the holiday. This hat can be worn only during the end of year holiday season.

7840.name: Rabbit Ears - Event
7840.description: Hair accessory. In rememberance of the day you took on the hordes of angry bunnies.

7845.name: Outlaw's Eyepatch
7845.description: Purple eyepatch accessory. It cannot be exchanged for an event item and can't be dropped.
